title: Tabletop RPG Spells
description: A collection of 136 rpg themed spells.
longDescription:
Unlock the magic of your tabletop adventures with the "Tabletop Spells" sound effect pack, a meticulously crafted collection of 136 spell sounds that bring the arcane arts to life. From protective wards and conjured creatures to mind-bending illusions and powerful evocations, this comprehensive library captures the essence of every magical school. Each sound is designed to enhance your storytelling, immersing players in a world where spells crackle with energy, barriers shimmer with enchantment, and the air hums with ancient power.


Whether you're a game master seeking to elevate your campaign or a creator looking to add authentic magic to your projects, "Tabletop Spells" offers a diverse range of spell effects, including abjuration, conjuration, divination, enchantment, evocation, illusion, necromancy, and transmutation. With an array of sounds tailored for every scenario—from epic battles to subtle divinations—this pack is the ultimate tool for crafting unforgettable magical moments. Let your imagination soar as you wield the power of sound to shape your own mystical universe.


Preview HERE

Audio File List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 136

Number of Audio Cues: 136

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
